faqs.q: How many calories in a rice crispy square?
faqs.a: Approximately 140 kcal for one standard 30g square.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a rice crispy square?
faqs.a: About 25g carbs, including 12g sugars, per square.

faqs.q: Are rice crispy squares high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, mainly from marshmallows; 12g sugars per square.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a rice crispy square?
faqs.a: Around 4g total fat, with 2.5g saturated, from the butter.

faqs.q: Can I make lower-calorie rice crispy squares?
faqs.a: Yes, use less butter or low-sugar marshmallows to reduce calories by 10-20%.
